txt.en: Zádokh Flint-eye can be found at Drenghól.\n\nYou have freed the dwarves in Dûn Traikh. Return to Zádokh Flint-eye for your reward.

'Our scouts have returned from Dûn Traikh with troubling news. The Angmarim have managed to capture a number of our allies and plan to force them to forge dwarf-made weapons! Free the captives, [placeholder]. Dwarves must not be used to arm our enemies, nor shall we leave any of our brethren in their grasp.'
'Those you freed returned here and spoke highly of your deeds. You have done us a great service on this day, friend.'
Captured dwarves are being forced to forge weapons for the enemy in Dûn Traikh!
'Have you freed the captives in Dûn Traikh? The enemy must not gain dwarf-made weapons!'
Dwarf-captives can be found in the Angmarim town of Dûn Traikh, in western Elderslade.\n\nYou should free dwarf-captives before they are forced to make weapons for the enemy.
